spam.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: to send the same message to many different people using email or the Internet, usually as a way of advertising something â€“ used to show disapproval
spam.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: email messages that a computer user has not asked for and does not want to read, for example from someone who is advertising something
spam.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: You can filter out spam with special software.
spam.translation[2].definitions[0].defin: a type of cheap canned meat made mainly from pork
spam.translation[3].definitions[0].defin: to send advertising material or other information by email to people you do not know who have not asked for it
spam.translation[3].definitions[0].examp: You may get spammed if you give out your e-mail address online.
spam.translation[4].definitions[0].defin: e-mail messages that a computer user has not asked for and does not want to read, for example messages from advertisers
spam.translation[4].definitions[0].examp: You can protect your computer from unwanted email spam.
